files.patch:
@@ -1733,5 +1733,4 @@
-            // For example, "MoveF2I_stack_reg".
-            // We always need a memory edge from src to cisc,
-            // else we might schedule cisc before src,
-            // loading from a spill location before storing the spill.
-            cisc->add_prec(src); // memory edge (spill reg to stack -> read stack)
+            // For example, "MoveF2I_stack_reg". We always need a memory edge from
+            // src to cisc, else we might schedule cisc before src, loading from a
+            // spill location before storing the spill.
+            cisc->add_prec(src);
